General.Name: Jiangsu Jingyuan Environmental Protection Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Jingyuan Environmental Protection Co., Ltd. provides water treatment solutions in China. The company offers industrial waste treatment equipment and systems, including coal-containing wastewater treatment, desulfurization wastewater treatment, and electrocatalytic oxidation treatment systems; biochemical systems; and advanced water treatment and reuse systems for use in the wastewater treatment and zero discharge treatment systems. It also provides water supply treatment systems, such as raw water pretreatment and demineralized water preparation systems that are used in the water supply treatment. In addition, the company engages in the special equipment design, consulting, system integration, sales, and engineering contracting businesses. It serves power, steel, chemical, municipal, and metal products industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Nantong, China.
